## Download C.virginica larvae/zygote FastQs and MD5 checksums
```{r download-sequencing-data, engine='bash', eval=TRUE}
# Download C.virginica larvae/zygote FastQs and MD5 checksums
wget \
--directory-prefix ../data \
--recursive \
--no-check-certificate \
--continue \
--cut-dirs 2 \
--no-host-directories \
--no-parent \
--quiet \
--reject "sample_files.txt" \
--accept "*.fastq.gz,*.txt" https://owl.fish.washington.edu/nightingales/C_virginica/2018OALarvae_DNAm_discovery/
```
